title: Wopke Hoekstra
summary: Wopke Bastiaan Hoekstra (Dutch pronunciation: [ˈʋɔpkə ˈbɑst͜ɕaːn ˈɦukstraː]; born 30 September 1975) is a Dutch politician who has served as second Deputy Prime Minister of the Netherlands and Minister of Foreign Affairs in the fourth Rutte cabinet since 10 January 2022. He has also been Leader of the Christian Democratic Appeal (CDA) since 2020. Hoekstra previously served as Minister of Finance in the third Rutte cabinet from 2017 to 2022.
